QuestData.Title: Primalist Tampering
QuestData.Description:
The Primalists are infusin' spiders with elemental ice and are fixin' to use 'em as shock troops tae overrun the dragons' defenses in the Span. We cannae let that happen.
The three frosty lookin' ones are in charge. Take 'em out and bring me the runestones they're using tae focus the primal magic and we can see about cuttin' off the flow.
